result.eng: This newspaper gives prominence to right-wing opinions.
result.ga: Tugann an nuachtán seo tús áite do thuairimí na heite deise
result.orig: Tugann an nuachtán seo tús áite do thuairimí na heite deise
result.html: Tugann an nuachtán seo tús áite do thuairimí na heite deiseThis newspaper gives prominence to right-wing opinions.
result.ponchtml: Tugann an nuaċtán seo tús áite do ṫuairimí na heite deiseThis newspaper gives prominence to right-wing opinions.

result.eng: The mouse is on your right-hand side.
result.ga: Tá an luchóg ar thaobh do láimhe deise
result.orig: Tá an luchóg ar thaobh do láimhe deise
result.html: Tá an luchóg ar thaobh do láimhe deiseThe mouse is on your right-hand side.
result.ponchtml: Tá an luċóg ar ṫaoḃ do láiṁe deiseThe mouse is on your right-hand side.

result.eng: If I am your best friend, then that is a sorry state of affairs for you.
result.ga: Más mise an cara is deise duit is truacánta an mhaise duit
result.orig: Más mise an cara is deise duit is truacánta an mhaise duit
result.html: Más mise an cara is deise duit is truacánta an mhaise duitIf I am your best friend, then that is a sorry state of affairs for you.
result.ponchtml: Más mise an cara is deise duit is truacánta an ṁaise duitIf I am your best friend, then that is a sorry state of affairs for you.
